result.purpose: Provides functionality to help applications that embed HCL for navigating and analyzing configuration files.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, with separate files handling distinct functionalities related to HCL file navigation and analysis.

hcled/doc.go.purpose: Provides functionality to help applications that embed HCL for navigating and analyzing configuration files.

hcled/navigation.go.purpose: Provides functions to retrieve context information from HCL files based on byte offsets.
